frontmatter.title: Popover
frontmatter.description: Popover is used to display floating content in relation to a trigger, usually a button or link.

internal.content:

#### Light #### Dark ### Properties


### Usage
#### Positioning of Popover Popovers appear either 8px above or 8px below their trigger. The **preferred and default side is the bottom**. Popovers use smart positioning if there is not enough space in the designated direction. ![Positioning of popover](./images/popover-1.png)
